Abstract: Police say Keith Lucas, carjacking suspect, was shot three times in exchange of gunfire with team of plainclothes police officers who stopped car theft on Bronx street; say Lucas shot at occupant of car, then at police; Lucas undergoes surgery and is listed in stable condition; he is charged with robbery, attempted murder, criminal possession of weapon and other charges; none of officers or occupants of car are injured (M)
Snippet: Police say Keith Lucas, carjacking suspect, was shot three times in exchange of gunfire with team of plainclothes police officers who stopped car theft on Bronx street; say Lucas shot at occupant of car, then at police; Lucas undergoes surgery and...
LeadParagraph: A carjacking suspect was shot three times early yesterday in an exchange of gunfire with a team of plainclothes police officers who stopped the car theft on a Bronx street, the police said.

Headline.Main: Suspect Is Shot As Bronx Police And Carjackers Exchange Fire
Headline.PrintHeadline: Suspect Is Shot As Bronx Police And Carjackers Exchange Fire
